$:/plugins/wikilabs/tocP/history.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/tocP/history
$:/plugins/wikilabs/tocP/history.text:
V 0.3.2 - 2023.07.01

* Improve "cooperation" with streams-plugin

V 0.3.0 - 2023.06.27

''Important'': These macros use a new parameter order

* Add a `viewField` parameter, that will allow us to change the link text
** defaults to: `caption`

* Add a `viewFieldTemplate` parameter, which works in combination with the `viewField` parameter
* This will make it possible to work with stream-lists

* Add examples to show, how tocP can work with the "streams-plugin" fields
** tocP can read the streams structure
** The other way around ''is not possible'' atm, 
*** tocP uses does not use the `stream-list` field. It's not needed

V 0.2.0 - 2023.06.22

* Custom icons can be used for open and closed state

* New "New Child" icon. Only 1 toolbar icon is left
** The second toolbar icon caused confusion anyway

* ''sort'' parameter is a subfilter now
** ''Important:'' The ''sort'' parameter is ''not'' backwards compatible

* ''exclude'' parameter is a subfilter now
* Update code based on core TOC macros from TW v5.3.0
* Plugin is compatible with TW >=v5.2.1

V 0.1.3 - 2020.12.25

* update to TW v5.2.2

V 0.1.2 - 2020.12.25

* update license

V 0.1.1 - 2020.01.19

* Update license link/text

V 0.1.0 - 2017

* improved / fixed tool button tooltips
* fixed plugin license typo
* new [[StyleSheet|$:/plugins/wikilabs/tocP/Stylesheet]] setting for `.tocp` class. It sets the default link color to green, which should set it apart from the standard toc
** This is probably a temporary solution, because it doesn't work for tabbed tocPs

* The "New Child" buttons now show a more detailed tooltip
** The actual "field-name: value" pair which will be used to create the new child

* tocP now shows the tooltip field, if available in tiddlers. see [[examples|GettingStarted]] or open [[level-1]] in edit mode

$:/plugins/wikilabs/tocP/readme.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/tocP/readme
$:/plugins/wikilabs/tocP/readme.text:
This plugin contains several "Table of Content" macros, that have the same parameters as the core toc macro. The main difference is, that it doesn't use tags to create the TOC scructure. It uses a "parent" field in so called "child - tiddlers". ''Detailed Documentation'' More details about this plugin can be found at: https://wikilabs.github.io/editions/tocP More plugins, themes and editions can be found at: https://wikilabs.github.io/ ''Important'' These macros are intended to be "drop in replacement" of the core macros. ... They have the exact same parameter names. Instead of "parent" it still uses "tag" as the first parameter. ''Usage'' ```
<>
<>
<>
<>
<>
<>
``` ''For Streams .. WIP'' ```
<$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="no"> <>
``` ''streamTextTemplate'': is just a `<$transclude mode=block/>` ''viewField'': usually needs to be `text` if a template is used ```
<$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="no"> <>
``` ''Simple Configuration'' * Enable / Disable the inline "New Child" button ** {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/tocP/toggle-new-child-button}} ''Known Problems'' * The "tabbed" versions don't show the "New Child" buttons * Color customisation isn't possible atm
